Menus: Edit Menu Item

Toolbar Icons:
Save : Click this icon to save the parameters chosen and go back to the Menu Manager  (previous window) [the-menu-you-chose-to-edit].
Apply : Click this icon to save the parameters chosen AND keep the same window open for editing.
Close : Click this icon to cancel any action in this screen.  You will go back to the previous window.

This window is divided into 2 main parts : Details and Parameters.
These vary in function of the type of Menu Item chosen. Some Details parameters can also be edited through the list in the Menu Manager. Some parameters may show only after clicking on the Apply or Save icon. Click the the 'Apply' icon if you wish to continue editing parameters as your editing screen remains open to edit.  If you click the 'Save' icon, it brings you back to the Menu Manager where you would have to click again on the Menu Item to edit the Parameters.
